All of the apps await below.

items.title: SIA: chip sales hit $791.7B in 2025, up 25.6% YoY, with Nvidia, AMD, and Intel accounting for $301.9B, up 40%; SIA expects sales to reach $1T in 2026 (Stephen Nellis/Reuters)
items.summary:
Stephen Nellis / Reuters:
SIA: chip sales hit $791.7B in 2025, up 25.6% YoY, with Nvidia, AMD, and Intel accounting for $301.9B, up 40%; SIA expects sales to reach $1T in 2026  —  Global semiconductor sales are expected to hit $1 trillion this year, the Semiconductor Industry Association said on Friday.

items.title: Just $10 today gets you this Spigen 35W 2-port USB-C charger (47% off)
items.summary:
Spigen 35W 2-ports USB-C GaN Charger

Buy for $10 (Reg. $19)

What we love

This compact Spigen GaN charger delivers up to 35W in a small, travel-friendly design. It has two USB-C ports for charging two devices at once, though output is split when both are in use, topping out at 25W. It’s great for folks looking to pick up a small and reliable everyday charger, and it’s hard to go wrong with it at $10.
